title: Dicuili - Liber De Mensura Orbis Terrae
description:
Dicuil (Dicuili, Dicuilus) was an Irish monk who moved to, then lived and worked on the continent; in the Frankish court in the early 9th century. This book, titled "Liber De Mensura Orbis Terrae," shows that he (and others) knew at that time that the earth was round.

There is an older edition of this book available onscanned by Google, but the quality of that edition is poor.

Enjoy this interesting and valuable historical document!
